content.html: [quote comment="1803"][quote comment="1802"]Will, I posted this on a post that it is a bit old, I am afraid. If you have moderation enabled, what will the behavior be? Will it show your comments as being under moderation, or just silently swallow it without any other warning? Alan's version does the second...[/quote] no problem, I still saw it. :)[/quote] Ahh, excellent. Good to know is on the list. Alan told me he believed it was a cookies related problem. I tried to troubleshoot it, to no avail (but hey, I am not a programmer). Cheers!
